title: The 2025 Salsa Fargo Forgoes a Full Overhaul, Will Still Haul Your Stuff All Over
content:
The new Fargo may not be a full overhaul, but we're not sure the Fargo really needed much updating, anyways.

Read the full article at The 2025 Salsa Fargo Forgoes a Full Overhaul, Will Still Haul Your Stuff All Over on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
